plugins.name: Fixiq ‚Äî Fix the scale of working area
plugins.description:
Intro

In Figma, the current scale is not shown anywhere on the canvas. You can‚Äôt see how far you have moved from the actual scale of the frame. You can only select the frame and see its dimensions. And then estimate the ratio of pixels to percentages.


In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

accepted.name: Roman Nebel
accepted.description: IT Manager / UX Expert / Pet-projects Developer

plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area

plugins.name: 10x HTML | Design to clean responsive code 10x faster
plugins.description:
‚ö°Ô∏è Instantly turn your Figma design into clean, responsive HTML / CSS / SCSS

üöÄ No registration, no paywall, click and get your code

üîç Preview / inspect the generated code in Figma

‚ö°Ô∏è Test responsiveness and make live adjustments

üéì Smart layout and naming



Who is it for ?


  1. Beginner looking to turn a design into a website starting from a clean structure where 90% of the work is already handled


  1. Advanced front-end developers looking to drastically speed up their workflow without compromising on the structure and readability of their code.


No registration required - run the plugin, select a frame and preview the result in a single click.

Works in both Design mode and Dev mode.



What is 10x HTML ?


Most design-to-code tools generate bloated or messy output, with non optimized layout.

That‚Äôs because extracting logic from a visual design ‚Äî especially an unstructured one ‚Äî is a hard problem..


10x HTML was built from the ground up with the clear goal of solving those issues with smart rules and layout inference.


We focus on :

- Understanding layout intent

- Reducing unnecessary nesting

- Recognizing repeated patterns (even copy-pasted ones)

- Grouping elements intelligently

- and more...


10x HTML doesn't claim to replace a frontend developer ‚Äî but it dramatically accelerates your workflow by giving you clean, factorized and structured code that you can build on.


Whether you're a beginner or an experienced front-end developer, 10xHTML is designed to handle most of the heavy lifting for you‚Äîmaking smart assumptions when needed and delivering perfect code with clear naming and structure that‚Äôs easy to build upon.


Clean, semantic code ‚Äì without the mess

- Converts buttons, inputs, headers, and more into proper HTML elements

- Uses a smart class system: base classes, modifiers, and utilities based on context

- Picks optimized class names

- Flattens overly nested layers


Smart, responsive export

- Fully responsive by default ‚Äî includes media and container queries

- Detects and links similar elements, even without components

- Intelligently groups and infers layout, even from unstructured designs


Live code and layout inspection

- Preview the final webpage right in Figma

- Test responsiveness

- Do live update to adjust the code

- Download the code and get ready for production


How to reach out ?

üí¨ Request support here

üí° Suggest an improvement here

üï∑ Report a bug here

üöÄ Join our Discord for support, feedback or questions..


‚ö†Ô∏è Note :

10x HTML is currently free and fully accessible as a Beta version.

We are trying to gather as much feedback as possible, so please feel free to post any kind of comments (bug report, idea, opinion...)

Once we reach the level of maturity we‚Äôre aiming for, we will switch to a paid model

(with very reasonable pricing)

plugins.name: FigCrawl
plugins.description:
FigCrawl: Your FigJam Content Extractor


What is FigCrawl?

FigCrawl is a powerful FigJam plugin that transforms your collaborative boards into structured, AI-ready data. It intelligently extracts and organizes all your board's content while preserving the visual hierarchy and relationships between elements.


Use Cases

For Designers & Teams

  1. Extract structured content from brainstorming sessions
  2. Convert visual collaboration into actionable data
  3. Document and archive board content
  4. Share board content in a structured format


For AI/LLM Integration

  1. Feed board content into AI tools
  2. Generate summaries and reports
  3. Analyze relationships between ideas
  4. Create structured documentation


For Documentation

  1. Export board content for documentation
  2. Create structured reports
  3. Archive important board sessions
  4. Share insights with stakeholders



How It Works

  1. Launch: Open the plugin in your FigJam board
  2. Extract: Click "Extract Content" to scan your board
  3. Review: See a summary of extracted content
  4. Copy: Choose to copy the entire board or individual pages
  5. Use: Paste the JSON into your preferred AI tool or LLM
plugins.tagline: Extract FigJam content into AI-ready data with one click

  1. Êú¨Êèí‰ª∂ÊîØÊåÅÊ†ÖÊ†ºÂõæÂÉèÂíåÁü¢ÈáèÂÖÉÁ¥†„ÄÇ
  2. ÂõæÂÉèÂ∞ÜÊòæÁ§∫Âú®Âõ∫ÂÆöÂ§ßÂ∞èÁöÑÈ¢ÑËßàÊ°ÜÂÜÖÔºåÁº©ÊîæËÆæÁΩÆ‰ºöÊ†πÊçÆÊÇ®ÁöÑÂºÄÂÖ≥ÈÄâÊã©ËøõË°åÂ∫îÁî®„ÄÇ
  3. Êèí‰ª∂Êìç‰Ωú‰æùËµñ‰∫é Figma ÁîªÂ∏É‰∏äÁöÑÈÄâ‰∏≠ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåËØ∑Á°Æ‰øùÂú®‰ΩøÁî®Êèí‰ª∂ÂâçÈÄâ‰∏≠Ê≠£Á°ÆÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†„ÄÇ


Introduction

Image Size Integration allows Figma users to efficiently manage and integrate images within frames, groups, and components. With this plugin, you can adjust image sizes and apply uniform dimensions for a consistent design output.


Function Description

  1. Allows users to select multiple elements (Frames, Groups, Components, Text, Instances, etc.) in a Figma design.
  2. Automatically calculates the maximum width and height from the selected elements.
  3. Displays each selected image inside a preview box, either maintaining its original size or resizing it based on the longest side, as determined by the user's settings.
  4. A toggle feature to switch between maintaining the image's original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  5. Supports flexible control over how images are displayed within their allocated preview space.


How to Use

  1. Select the elements (Frames, Groups, Text, Components, Instances, etc.) you want to preview and adjust.
  2. Click the "Generate Base64 Preview" button to create image previews.
  3. Use the toggle to switch between keeping the image‚Äôs original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  4. View the adjusted images and their corresponding dimensions directly within the plugin's interface.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports both raster images and vector elements.
  2. Images will be displayed in a fixed-size preview box, and resizing settings apply based on your toggle choice.
  3. The plugin works with selected elements in Figma's canvas, so ensure you have the right items selected before applying the tool.

Quickly save and reuse design resources without creating components.


You can:

  1. Save frequently used icons, components, images, and all design elements.
  2. Quickly create clones.
  3. Backup design drafts on a separate page to keep your workspace organized.
  4. Use it as a clipboard with history.

  2. It uses local storage and does not support cross-device or cross-browser functionality.
  3. It also does not support calling design content across different files.

---

plugins.name: BableBox
plugins.description:
BableBox is a Figma plugin designed to make translating your interfaces a breeze. With a single click, it converts your entire design from one language to another, preserving context to ensure accurate, natural translations.


Say goodbye to the hassle of translating hundreds of words and phrases manually! BableBox leverages GPT-4o mini, one of the best AI models, which understands the context of each text to avoid errors (it intelligently skips icons and symbols like FontAwesome, for instance).


This plugin is perfect for designers and global teams looking for a fast, reliable, and easy solution to translate projects while maintaining content coherence and quality.


In short: a one-click translation tool built to save you time and reduce errors. üåçüöÄ
plugins.tagline: BableBox: Translate your designs in one click, with perfect context üåç

plugins.name: Juxync
plugins.description:
Want to get alpha access to Jux? Visit jux.io


Jux is a code-based canvas design tool that plugs right into developer's codebase, enabling product designers to design the UI itself and developers its logic.

Creating a good color tokens system is a complex task. Use Juxync to import your variables to Jux to use as design tokens. Juxync will convert your variables collections, groups and modes into token sets to use in Jux. It will maintain all the relationships between variables.


How does Juxync work?

For more visual ‚Äòhow does it work‚Äò, visit the knowledge base

  1. It scans Figma color variables in your chosen file.
  2. The plugin auto maps the tokens into core, and other semantics sets.
  3. Sync the tokens into the Jux token management, allowing developers to view and use these tokens via our CLI.


Next up: (or Future features)

  1. Sync Assets (SVG)
  2. Dimensions tokens
  3. Typography styles
  4. Check out the roadmap for more information


Want to be among the first to join the alpha? Join our community

accepted.name: Jux
accepted.description: We‚Äôre building a code-based design tool so designers can design the actual, real product as it will be used in production.

plugins.tagline: Juxync imports your Figma Variables as design tokens to Jux, seamlessly.

plugins.name: PrevGen
plugins.description:
PREVGEN - MICROSTOCK PREVIEW GENERATOR

=======================================


üéØ WHAT IS PREVGEN?

PrevGen is a specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for microstock creators who need to generate hundreds of design previews quickly and efficiently. Stop spending hours creating mockups one by one - automate your entire preview generation workflow.


‚ö° HOW IT WORKS:

1. CREATE TEMPLATE

- Design your preview template in Figma

- Use built-in templates (Freepik, Envato, DepositPhotos formats)

- Mark container layers for your designs


2. UPLOAD DESIGNS

- Drag & drop PNG, JPG, SVG files

- Auto-trim PNG transparency (optional)

- Batch process multiple files


3. CONFIGURE LAYOUT

- Choose: Horizontal, Vertical, or Grid layout

- Auto-spacing and alignment

- Fit or Fill image scaling options


4. CUSTOMIZE CONTENT

- Auto-replace text with filenames

- Apply custom colors to layers

- Bulk background color changes


5. GENERATE PREVIEWS

- Mass generate all previews instantly

- Auto-naming with prefix/suffix options

- Perfect positioning and spacing


‚ú® KEY FEATURES:

===============

- TEMPLATE SYSTEM - Built-in templates for major microstock platforms

- BATCH PROCESSING - Upload and process multiple designs at once

- AUTO LAYOUT - Smart positioning with customizable spacing

- TEXT AUTOMATION - Auto-replace text layers with design names

- COLOR MAPPING - Apply custom colors to specific layers

- PNG OPTIMIZATION - Auto-trim transparent areas

- FLEXIBLE SCALING - Fit or Fill image modes

- BULK OPERATIONS - Generate hundreds of previews in one click


üé® SUPPORTED FORMATS:

====================

- PNG (with transparency trimming)

- JPG/JPEG


üìê BUILT-IN TEMPLATES:

=====================

- Freepik: Landscape (4500√ó3000), Portrait (3000√ó4500), Square (3500√ó3500)

- Envato Elements: Main Image (2340√ó1560), Secondary (2340√ó1500)

- DepositPhotos: Landscape (4500√ó3000), Portrait (3000√ó4500), Square (3500√ó3500)


üöÄ PERFECT FOR:

===============

- Stock designers creating portfolio previews

- Microstock contributors preparing submissions

- Design agencies showcasing client work

- Freelancers building presentation materials

- Anyone needing bulk design mockups


üí° USE CASES:

=============

- Create portfolio previews for Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Getty Images

- Generate client presentation mockups

- Build design showcase galleries

- Prepare submission previews for stock platforms

- Automate repetitive design tasks


üéØ WHO BENEFITS:

===============

- Microstock photographers and designers

- Stock content contributors

- Digital design agencies

- Freelance graphic designers

- Portfolio creators


üíù PRICING:

===========

100% FREE for microstock creators and designers

No hidden fees, no subscriptions, no limitations


üõ†Ô∏è TECHNICAL SPECS:

==================

- Works with Figma Desktop and Web

- No external dependencies

- Processes files locally (secure)

- Supports unlimited file uploads

- Auto-saves plugin settings


üìû SUPPORT & CONTACT:

====================

- Bug Reports: yasadesign.work@gmail.com

Love PrevGen? Support continued development:

PayPal

plugins.name: SVG Exporter
plugins.description:
Este plugin te permite exportar elementos gr√°ficos (assets) en formato SVG desde cualquier Frame que selecciones en Figma. Al ejecutarlo:

1. El plugin detecta autom√°ticamente los vectores, √≠conos y componentes dentro del frame seleccionado.

2. Muestra una lista con vista previa de cada asset, su nombre y tipo (VECTOR, LINE, COMPONENT, etc.).

3. Puedes filtrar por tipo, seleccionar o deseleccionar assets individualmente o todos a la vez.

4. Al hacer clic en ‚ÄúExportar selecci√≥n‚Äù, los archivos se descargan en un ZIP listo para usar.


Uso paso a paso:

‚Ä¢ Selecciona un Frame que contenga los assets que deseas exportar.

‚Ä¢ Ejecuta el plugin.

‚Ä¢ Filtra, selecciona y exporta.


Limitaciones actuales:

‚Ä¢ Solo funciona si seleccionas un Frame (no soporta m√∫ltiples frames a la vez).

‚Ä¢ Solo exporta elementos compatibles con formato SVG.

‚Ä¢ No incluye im√°genes rasterizadas, texto plano ni auto layout como exportables.

‚Ä¢ No detecta autom√°ticamente cambios de selecci√≥n; requiere usar el bot√≥n ‚ÄúActualizar selecci√≥n‚Äù.



-----------------------------------------


This plugin lets you export graphical elements (assets) as SVG files from any selected Frame in Figma.


When you run the plugin:

1. It scans the selected frame for valid exportable elements (e.g., VECTORS, ICONS, COMPONENTS).

2. You‚Äôll see a list of assets with preview thumbnails, names, and their Figma types.

3. You can filter by type, toggle selection, and bulk-select assets.

4. Clicking ‚ÄúExport Selection‚Äù downloads all selected assets as a clean ZIP file of SVGs.


How to use it:

‚Ä¢ Select a Frame that contains the assets you want to export.

‚Ä¢ Launch the plugin.

‚Ä¢ Use the filters, select assets, and export.


Current limitations:

‚Ä¢ Only one Frame can be selected at a time.

‚Ä¢ Only elements that support SVG export will be included (e.g., no bitmaps or text layers).

‚Ä¢ Does not automatically react to new selections ‚Äî use the ‚ÄúRefresh Selection‚Äù button manually when needed.
plugins.tagline: Exporta f√°cilmente assets SVG desde frames seleccionados en Figma, con vista previa y filtros.

plugins.name: Spacing and radius fixer
plugins.description:
Auto-fix spacing & radius

Plugin that automatically rounds spacing and radius values to the nearest preset value in Auto Layout objects.


What it does

- Rounds gap and padding values to the nearest preset spacing

- Rounds corner radius to the nearest preset radius

- Works with any Auto Layout object (frames, components, instances)


Presets

Default values (can be customized in plugin):

Spacing: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 80 (px)

Radius: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 100 (px)


How to use

1. Select Auto Layout object(s)

2. Run the plugin

3. Switch between Spacing/Radius modes

4. Customize presets if needed (or use Reset to restore defaults)

5. Click Apply
plugins.tagline: Fixes inconsistent spacing and radius values by rounding them to the nearest preset

plugins.name: Structura ‚Äì Effortless Page Organization
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.


Structura helps teams and designers maintain consistency across projects by enabling the creation, saving, and application of structured page layouts. Whether you prefer using built-in presets or custom templates, Structura simplifies your workflow, ensuring every file is clear and organized.



‚ú® Key Features


  1. Create & Save Custom Templates ‚Äì Design your own page structures and reuse them effortlessly.
  2. Use Ready-Made Presets ‚Äì Get started instantly with professionally designed page layouts.
  3. One-Click Template Application ‚Äì Quickly apply a structure to any Figma file.
  4. Consistent File Organization ‚Äì Standardize file layouts for better team collaboration.
  5. Easy Editing & Updating ‚Äì Modify and update templates as your workflow evolves.

plugins.name: Private Notes
plugins.description:
Private Notes allows you to attach personal annotations to any layer in your Figma file that remain completely private to you.


  1. Truly Private: Notes are stored locally and their contents are only visible to you, never to other collaborators
  2. Visual Markers: Customisable markers show where you've left notes (only visible when you run the plugin)
  3. Flexible Positioning: Place note markers in 8 different positions around your layers that stay fixed to the right frame.
  4. Persistent Storage: Your notes remain attached to layers even when you close and reopen Figma


Perfect for designers who want to keep track of personal thoughts, reminders, and to-dos without cluttering the file with comments visible to everyone.


Use it for recording client feedback, noting implementation details, or leaving yourself breadcrumbs for areas that need further attention.


Please contact me for any feedback. suggestions or issues!
plugins.tagline: Keep your thoughts private- annotations only you can see.

plugins.name: Zuuvi Export Service
plugins.description:
Zuuvi Export Service is a Figma plugin designed to integrate Figma with Zuuvi‚Äôs Studio platform, making it easier and more efficient for designers who work with both tools. The plugin helps reduce the need to manually recreate designs in Studio after first mocking them up in Figma. While built around Figma‚Äôs capabilities, the exported result aims to reflect the original design as closely as possible within the constraints of Studio‚Äôs features.


Easily export ad creatives from Figma directly into your Zuuvi workspace - ready for production, personalisation, and cross-channel publishing.

Whether you're designing HTML5 banners, social media ads, retail media formats or in-store screens, this plugin helps creative teams move faster and stay in control.


üîß What You Can Do with the Zuuvi Plugin:

  1. Export static or layered ad designs directly from Figma to Zuuvi
  2. Optimise for use across display, social, retail media, DOOH, video, and more
  3. Support for production-ready HTML5 ad creatives
  4. Maintain template structure and layer control for streamlined animation workflows


üöÄ Why Use Zuuvi for Your Ad Production?

Zuuvi is a Creative Performance Platform that empowers marketers and designers to:


  1. Build high-quality, high-performing HTML5 ads at speed
  2. Personalise and localise creatives across channels and markets
  3. Scale ad production without adding design overhead
  4. Centralise all ad formats - from social media creatives to dynamic banners - in one platform


üìö Documentation & Support

Full plugin guide and step-by-step tutorials: https://help.zuuvi.com/en/articles/10774913-how-to-export-from-figma-to-zuuvi-studio


Questions? Reach out anytime via our live chat or care@zuuvi.com


üß© Requirements

To use this plugin, an active Zuuvi account is required.

Not a user yet? Learn more and book a demo here.


üîí Data Security

We value your creative integrity and your data privacy. Zuuvi follows best practices for security, and all plugin exports are processed securely through your Zuuvi account.


Design in Figma. Scale in Zuuvi.

From idea to high-performing ad campaign ‚Äì Zuuvi makes creative production fast, scalable, and impactful.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs to omnichannel ad campaigns

plugins.name: Text Styles from CSV
plugins.description:
**Text Styles from CSV** is a Figma plugin that allows users to import text styles directly from a CSV file, saving time and ensuring consistency across projects.


### ‚ú® Features:

- üìÇ Import text styles from a CSV file with one click.

- üî† Supports font family, weight, size, letter spacing, and line height.

- üé® Automatically creates text styles in Figma for easy reuse.

- ‚ö° Speeds up the design process by reducing manual styling.


### üìå How It Works:

1. Open the plugin in Figma.

2. Upload your CSV file containing text style definitions.

3. Click "Import" to instantly create and apply styles.


For more details, check the **[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/metagrati/text-styles-from-csv).**
plugins.tagline: Import text styles into Figma from a CSV file. Automate typography styles creation.

plugins.name: Type Rhythm
plugins.description:
A simple plugin for efficiently adjusting typography in Figma. You can increase or decrease font size in 8px increments, and adjust line height in 10% increments. It also allows you to convert Auto line height to 150%. Using tools like Keyboard Maestro to set up shortcuts can enhance your workflow.
